tldr: Affected versions of the package may expose sensitive information in log files. The debug logger may inadvertently reveal SMTP authentication data, creating a security risk.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range and enabled debug logging.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/wneessen/go-mail` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
